H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H7498.def: = man; ancestor of a tribe of giants

H8337.def: = state in which a countable entity is six in number

H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H8034.def: = one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

H1074.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Azel<SDBH:אָצֵל>}; of the tribe of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}

H2605.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Shashak<SDBH:שָׁשָׁק>}; tribe of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► family head

H251.def: = son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

H198.def: = marker indicating that the information that follows is in contrast with what has preceded

H1060.def: = first offspring of any female; ► in the case of humans, the main heir of estate and blessing

H8145.def: = state in which a countable entity is the second in a range

H7992.def: = state in which a countable entity is the third in a range

H198.def: = marker indicating that the information that follows is in contrast with what has preceded

H1368.def: = a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

H582.def: = human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality

H1869.def: = action by which humans or animals move forward by lifting and setting down each foot in turn

H7198.def: = a strong but flexible piece of wood to which a string is attached for the firing of arrows, ► used for hunting or as weapon of war

H3967.def: = state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number

H2572.def: = state in which a countable entity is five in number

H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H1144.def: = man (called {L:Ben-Oni<SDBH:בֶּן־אֹונִי>} by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and second son of {L:Rachel<SDBH:רָחֵל>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}
